item.title: The State of Internet Censorship in Malaysia
item.description: Block page in Malaysia A research study by the Open Observatory of Network Interference (OONI) and Sinar Project. Table of contents Key Findings Introduction Background Network landscape and internet penetration Legal environment Freedom of expression Press freedom Access to information Privacy Censorship and surveillance Previous cases of internet censorship and surveillance
